name: Shibcraft
description: Shibcraft is an open world web3 game built for the Shiba Inu Token community that is playable now. Players use shib to buy in game items, save player stats on chain, and submit scores on the prized leaderboards to earn shib. Shibcraft Token, SHFT, gives players access to those same in game features automatically. The SHFT contract automatically donates SHIB to GiveWell charity's Ethereum address.
